704351f-b.title: Brooklyn: Flatlands Avenue - Flatbush Avenue
704351f-b.text:
(1)
Flatlands Ave., south side, between Flatbush Ave., and Ryder
Street, showing the Peter Lott house.
February 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, from another angle.
August 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(3)
The same, another view.
August 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(4)
The same, after damages by fire in December 1925.
December 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
704351f-b.folder: Flatlands Avenue & Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
